content.html: "Everybody says they're trying to get their piece of the pie. They don't realize that the world is a kitchen. You can make your own pie." — Terry Crews Someone else winning doesn't mean you're going to lose. Your success is in YOUR hands. Get after it!
content.value:
"Everybody says they're trying to get their piece of the pie. They don't realize that the world is a kitchen. You can make your own pie." — Terry Crews

Someone else winning doesn't mean you're going to lose. Your success is in YOUR hands. Get after it!
